title.rendered: Amazon Seller Virtual Assistants – Why Hire a Virtual Assistant with Ana Santiago from Outsource School

content.rendered:
Podcast: Play in new window | Download (Duration: 36:00 — 33.0MB)

Subscribe: Spotify | Email | RSS

Podcast (10k-podcast): Play in new window | Download (Duration: 36:00 — 33.0MB)

Subscribe: Spotify | Email | TuneIn | RSS

If you’ve considered hiring a VA but have not taken the plunge, or if you have tried hiring but it’s not really worked out,  today’s guest is going to help change that for you! Ana Santiago is the COO of Outsource School, she has been working remotely for over 10 years and now manages a team of over 15 VAs. Listen in for her insights on Filipino VAs.

 

1. Special Community Discount for 20% off our yearly plan:
Code: Outsource20
Checkout Page: Outsource School Insider Checkout

Schedule a call with Ana for an in-depth explanation of how we can help and what our services are + additional bonuses to the discount: Chat with Ana from Outsource School

2. VA Budget Calculator: Download the Free VA Calculator to Understand Your Hiring Budget (outsourceschool.com)

3. 5 Keys to Scaling Any Digital Business with Virtual Assistants – Three Crazy Simple Tactics to Hiring a VA (outsourceschool.com)

You’ll Learn:

  • The number one reason that is stopping people from using a Virtual Assistant
  • Why VAs in the Philippines are great VAs
  • The secrets to building a great relationship with your VA
  • How to get ready to outsource
  • The difference between a virtual assistant and a personal assistant
